recommendations.insight: Top recurring ticket theme (cluster 1): payments, failed, refund, payout, late, charge, double
recommendations.action: Create a Tiger Team for the top theme with a 2-sprint bug bash; link Zendesk macros + public help doc; add canary telemetry.

recommendations.insight: Support load is heaviest on 'Payments' component.
recommendations.action: Increase automated tests and error budgets for this component; route a higher % of sprint capacity to defect reduction for 1 month.

recommendations.insight: Highest expected pipeline value region is 'London'.
recommendations.action: Allocate 30% more BDR time and targeted campaigns in this region; localize case studies; set weekly pipeline review.

recommendations.insight: 92 mid/late-stage opportunities not touched in the last 7 days.
recommendations.action: Auto-generate nudges and personalized email drafts for owners; enforce SLA for touches at each stage.

recommendations.insight: 6 employees show high attrition risk; many are in CS/Support.
recommendations.action: Implement CS career ladder, adjust compa-ratios below 0.9, and reduce manager spans >9 via hiring or redistribution.
